187164.content:
Može mala pomoć?

.

Nakon što sam izvršio naredbu export LC_ALL=hr_HR.UTF-8 pri pokretanju programa javlja mi sljedeće:

perl: warning: Setting locale failed.

perl: warning: Please check that your locale settings:

LC_ALL = “hr_HR.UTF-8”,

LANG = “en_GB.UTF-8”

are supported and installed on your system.

perl: warning: Falling back to the standard locale (“C”).

Zna li možda netko u čemu je problem?

187262.content:
![](assets/2021-05-09/00034.png)

nakon toga upisat u cmd:

set LC_ALL=hr_HR.UTF-8

set LANG =hr_HR.UTF-8

edit: ne radi
